abstract: Karim Matmour (Arabic: كريم مطمور‎) (born 25 June 1985) is an Algerian professional footballer. He currently plays as an attacking midfielder or forward 1. FC Kaiserslautern.An Algerian international since 2007, Matmour featured at the 2010 FIFA World Cup and 2010 Africa Cup of Nations. As of July 2013, he has won 30 international caps and scored 2 goals.
